articles.title: Joshua Tree National Park is employing camels to help save the iconic Joshua tree - Vox.com
articles.description: A new solution to save the Joshua tree uses one of the Mojave’s ancient seed distributors: The camel.
articles.content:
In the summer of 2020, the Dome Fire leaped across the Mojave National Preserve in southeastern California, killing more than 1.3 million Joshua trees.
